name: Murder Machine Mini
description: Wake up my little machine and try again. MURDER MACHINE MINI is a tactical FirstPersonShooter unlike any other. No cover, no autoaim, no instanthit, no handholding. A think - move - shoot game.
minimum_requirements: OS: Winows 7 or after Processor: Dual Core Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Integrated Mobile Video Card Storage: 500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Winows 7 or after Processor: Quad Core Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Super Expensive Video Card Storage: 999 MB available space
